xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.3 Abyākatapada » 2.3.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
45.
1356Hetusampayutto abyākato dhammo hetusampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
46.
1357Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1358Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1359Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1360(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1361Hetusampayuttadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika >>
